column3:
utACK a327e8ea30e10abdce910a3e37c78e00d0918548

On Mon, Mar 13, 2017 at 4:15 PM, Wladimir J. van der Laan
<notifications@github.com> wrote:
> This changes tree_sha512sum() to requests the objects for hashing from git
> instead of from the working tree.
>
> The change should make the process more deterministic (it hashes what will
> be pushed) and hopefully avoids the frequent miscomputed S
@MarcoFalke thanks\nI checked this against many recent merge commits and am now confident enough that this computes the same output as the old algorithm, to merge this.
